about_the_game:
The Walls is a unique first-person horror-thriller game that combines simulation life and psychological trauma. A story of escape filled with nightmares, trapped within a simulation universe that is reality itself.

Markus, dragged into a deep psychological pit by the pain of losing his family, finds himself confronting his nightmares in this simulation universe. As he progresses on his journey, Markus's attempts to escape this universe pull him deeper and force him to face his deepest fears. Every minute you spend in the game, you will witness an adventure that blurs the boundaries between reality and imagination as you navigate the dark corners of Markus's mind. In this escape, you will witness deep fears, hallucinations, and sounds that emerge one after another.
